# sirfunctions

  

## Overview

The `sirfunctions` package contains key functions used by the
Surveillance, Innovation, and Research (SIR) team within the Polio
Eradication Branch (PEB) at the Centers for Disease Control and
Prevention (CDC). It includes functions to download cleaned global polio
data from the World Health Organization (WHO) Polio Information System
(POLIS) and geographic files. In addition, the package contains
functions to visualize important epidemiological trends and perform key
performance indicators such as NPAFP rates, EV rates, and stool
adequacy.

## Installation and Updates

Ensure that `pak` is installed (if not run `install.packages("pak")`).
Then run the following command:

    pak::pkg_install("CDCGov/sirfunctions")

Remember to update `sirfunctions` regularly. If no update is needed, the
line of code above will automatically skip.

## Usage

Use any function developed in this package using:
`sirfunctions::{function}`

For example: `sirfunctions::edav_io(io = "list")`

You can find the documentation for any function by running:
`?sirfunctions::{function}`

For example:
[`?sirfunctions::edav_io`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/edav_io.md)

The quick start guide can be viewed
[here](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/articles/sirfunctions.html).

## Release Schedule

Please see the
[Releases](https://github.com/nish-kishore/sirfunctions/releases) page
for specifics on previous releases.

## Contact

Please send a message to Stephanie Kovacs at <uvx4@cdc.gov> for any
questions or queries.

This repository constitutes a work of the United States Government and
is not subject to domestic copyright protection under 17 USC § 105. This
repository is in the public domain within the United States, and
copyright and related rights in the work worldwide are waived through
the [CC0 1.0 Universal public domain
dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/). All
contributions to this repository will be released under the CC0
dedication. By submitting a pull request you are agreeing to comply with
this waiver of copyright interest.

## Privacy Standard Notice

This repository contains only non-sensitive, publicly available data and
information. All material and community participation is covered by the
[Disclaimer](https://github.com/CDCgov/template/blob/master/DISCLAIMER.md)
and [Code of
Conduct](https://github.com/CDCgov/template/blob/master/code-of-conduct.md).
For more information about CDC’s privacy policy, please visit
[http://www.cdc.gov/other/privacy.html](https://www.cdc.gov/other/privacy.html).

## Contributing Standard Notice

Anyone is encouraged to contribute to the repository by
[forking](https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo) and submitting a
pull request. (If you are new to GitHub, you might start with a [basic
tutorial](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git).) By contributing
to this project, you grant a world-wide, royalty-free, perpetual,
irrevocable, non-exclusive, transferable license to all users under the
terms of the [Apache Software License
v2](http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.md) or later.

All comments, messages, pull requests, and other submissions received
through CDC including this GitHub page may be subject to applicable
federal law, including but not limited to the Federal Records Act, and
may be archived. Learn more at
[http://www.cdc.gov/other/privacy.html](http://www.cdc.gov/other/privacy.md).

## Records Management Standard Notice

This repository is not a source of government records, but is a copy to
increase collaboration and collaborative potential. All government
records will be published through the [CDC web
site](http://www.cdc.gov).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_rolling_years()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/add_rolling_years.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Label rolling year periods

- [`check_afp_geographies()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/check_afp_geographies.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Check whether the AFP geography matches those
  of the population dataset

- [`check_afp_guid_ctry_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/check_afp_guid_ctry_data.md)
  : Check GUIDs present in the AFP linelist but not in the pop files

- [`check_missing_rows()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/check_missing_rows.md)
  : Check for rows with NA values

- [`clean_ctry_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/clean_ctry_data.md)
  : Cleans and adds additional age and dosage number columns to the AFP
  linelist

- [`clean_es_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/clean_es_data.md)
  : Clean environmental surveillance data

- [`clean_iss_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/clean_iss_data.md)
  : Perform common cleaning tasks for ISS/eSURV data

- [`clean_lab_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/clean_lab_data.md)
  : Clean lab data

- [`clear_local_polio_data_cache()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/clear_local_polio_data_cache.md)
  : Clear local polio data cache

- [`compress_png()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/compress_png.md)
  : Compress PNG files using pngquant

- [`create_60_day_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_60_day_export.md)
  : Export 60-day follow up table

- [`create_afp_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_afp_export.md)
  : Export the AFP linelist

- [`create_cg_expansion_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_cg_expansion_map.md)
  : Create the consequential geography expansion map

- [`create_cg_super_regions()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_cg_super_regions.md)
  : Create super regions from subsets of consequential geographies

- [`create_emergence_group_gif()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_emergence_group_gif.md)
  : Generate Emergence Group Movement Gifs

- [`create_npafp_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_npafp_export.md)
  : Exports NPAFP indicator data summary tables

- [`create_pop_check_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_pop_check_export.md)
  : Exports file for checking population roll-ups

- [`create_pot_comp_clust_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_pot_comp_clust_export.md)
  : Export potentially compatible and compatible summary table

- [`create_stool_adequacy_export()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/create_stool_adequacy_export.md)
  : Export stool adequacy data

- [`ctry_data_errors()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/ctry_data_errors.md)
  : Check data quality errors from the country data

- [`duplicate_check()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/duplicate_check.md)
  : Assess duplicates in the get_all_polio_data() output

- [`edav_io()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/edav_io.md)
  : Helper function to read and write key data to the EDAV environment

- [`explore_edav()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/explore_edav.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Interactive loading of EDAV data

- [`export_kpi_table()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/export_kpi_table.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Export KPI tables

- [`extract_country_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/extract_country_data.md)
  : Extract country specific information from raw polio data

- [`f.color.schemes()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.color.schemes.md)
  : Utility function for colors

- [`f.ev.rate.01()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.ev.rate.01.md)
  : Calculate EV detection rate function

- [`f.expand.bbox()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.expand.bbox.md)
  : Expand bounding box

- [`f.metadata.tag()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.metadata.tag.md)
  : Function to add metadata tags to figures and tables

- [`f.npafp.rate.01()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.npafp.rate.01.md)
  **\[stable\]** : Calculate non-polio AFP rate

- [`f.plot.looks()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.plot.looks.md)
  : Set plot looks

- [`f.stool.ad.01()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.stool.ad.01.md)
  : Calculate percent stool adequacy

- [`f.timely.detection.01()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/f.timely.detection.01.md)
  : Function to calculate timeliness of detection

- [`fix_ctry_data_missing_guids()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/fix_ctry_data_missing_guids.md)
  : Fix unknown GUIDs in the AFP linelist

- [`flag_cg_positives()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/flag_cg_positives.md)
  : Flag positives data from identified consequential geographies

- [`force_load_polio_data_cache()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/force_load_polio_data_cache.md)
  : Force load data from the local cache

- [`generate_60_day_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_60_day_tab.md)
  : 60-day follow up table

- [`generate_60_day_table_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_60_day_table_data.md)
  : Generate summary table for those requiring 60-day follow-up

- [`generate_ad_final_col()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_ad_final_col.md)
  :

  Helper function to add the `adequacy.final` column

- [`generate_adhoc_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_adhoc_map.md)
  : Create adhoc maps for emergences

- [`generate_afp_by_month_summary()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_afp_by_month_summary.md)
  **\[stable\]** : Generate AFP case count summary

- [`generate_afp_case_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_afp_case_map.md)
  : AFP case map

- [`generate_afp_ctry_year()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_afp_ctry_year.md)
  : AFP cases by ctry and year

- [`generate_afp_epicurve()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_afp_epicurve.md)
  : Epicurve of AFP cases by year

- [`generate_afp_prov_year()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_afp_prov_year.md)
  : AFP cases by province and year

- [`generate_c1_rollup()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c1_rollup.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate C1 rollup for high-priority countries

- [`generate_c1_table()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c1_table.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : GPEI Strategy surveillance KPIs

- [`generate_c2_table()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c2_table.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : AFP surveillance KPI summary

- [`generate_c3_rollup()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c3_rollup.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Create a country level rollup of the C3 label

- [`generate_c3_table()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c3_table.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Environmental surveillance KPIs by site

- [`generate_c4_table()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_c4_table.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Laboratory surveillance KPIs

- [`generate_case_num_dose_g()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_case_num_dose_g.md)
  : Immunization rates per year

- [`generate_ctry_timeliness_graph()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_ctry_timeliness_graph.md)
  : Timeliness intervals of samples at the country level

- [`generate_dist_pop_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_dist_pop_map.md)
  : Map district U15 populations

- [`generate_dr_ppt()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_dr_ppt.md)
  : Generate the desk review slide deck

- [`generate_dr_ppt2()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_dr_ppt2.md)
  : Generate the desk review slide deck from the figures folder

- [`generate_es_det_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_es_det_map.md)
  : ES detection map

- [`generate_es_site_det()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_es_site_det.md)
  : Virus detection in ES sites

- [`generate_es_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_es_tab.md)
  : ES surveillance sites summary table

- [`generate_es_timely()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_es_timely.md)
  : ES timeliness scatterplot

- [`generate_inad_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_inad_tab.md)
  : Issues with stool adequacy at the country level

- [`generate_inad_tab_region()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_inad_tab_region.md)
  : Generate a stool adequacy summary at the regional level

- [`generate_incidence_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_incidence_map.md)
  : Generate incidence map timeline

- [`generate_int_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_int_data.md)
  : Generate a summary table for sample timeliness intervals

- [`generate_iss_barplot()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_iss_barplot.md)
  : Visits to health clinics per year

- [`generate_iss_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_iss_map.md)
  : Map of high priority health facilities

- [`generate_kpi_barchart()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_barchart.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate KPI indicator bar charts

- [`generate_kpi_ev_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_ev_map.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : EV detection rate map

- [`generate_kpi_evdetect_bar()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_evdetect_bar.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate KPI EV rate bar chart summary

- [`generate_kpi_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_map.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate KPI maps

- [`generate_kpi_npafp_bar()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_npafp_bar.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate KPI NPAFP bar chart summary

- [`generate_kpi_npafp_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_npafp_map.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate district level NPAFP maps by region

- [`generate_kpi_stool_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_stool_map.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate district level stool adequacy maps

- [`generate_kpi_stoolad_bar()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_stoolad_bar.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generate KPI Stool adequacy bar chart summary

- [`generate_kpi_tile()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_tile.md)
  : Generate tile plots for indicators

- [`generate_kpi_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_kpi_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Generates KPI violin plot

- [`generate_lab_culture_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_culture_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timeliness of lab samples from collection to
  virus isolation results

- [`generate_lab_itd_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_itd_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timeliness of virus isolation to ITD results

- [`generate_lab_itdres_seqres_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_itdres_seqres_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timeliness of final ITD results to sequencing
  results

- [`generate_lab_seqres_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_seqres_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timeliness of arrival at sequencing lab to
  sequencing results

- [`generate_lab_seqship_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_seqship_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timeliness of shipment to sequencing results

- [`generate_lab_timeliness()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_lab_timeliness.md)
  : Summary of lab sample timeliness

- [`generate_npafp_maps()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_npafp_maps.md)
  : Maps of NPAFP rates by province and year

- [`generate_npafp_maps_dist()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_npafp_maps_dist.md)
  : Maps of NPAFP rates by district and year

- [`generate_pop_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_pop_map.md)
  : Country map with province populations

- [`generate_pop_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_pop_tab.md)
  : Summary table of indicators at the province level

- [`generate_pop_tab_ctry()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_pop_tab_ctry.md)
  : Country-Level Population Surveillance Table (wide, multi-year)

- [`generate_potentially_compatibles_cluster()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_potentially_compatibles_cluster.md)
  : Creating a table of compatible and potentially compatible cases

- [`generate_prov_timeliness_graph()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_prov_timeliness_graph.md)
  : Timeliness intervals of samples at the province level

- [`generate_sg_priority_map()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_sg_priority_map.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : SG Prioritization Map

- [`generate_stool_ad_maps()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_stool_ad_maps.md)
  : Stool adequacy maps by province

- [`generate_stool_ad_maps_dist()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_stool_ad_maps_dist.md)
  : Maps of stool adequacy by district and year

- [`generate_stool_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_stool_data.md)
  : Generate stool adequacy columns in the AFP dataset

- [`generate_surv_ind_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_surv_ind_tab.md)
  : Surveillance indicator table

- [`generate_surv_reg_tab()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_surv_reg_tab.md)
  : Regional Surveillance Indicators by Year (Multi-country aggregate)

- [`generate_timeliness_maps()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_timeliness_maps.md)
  : Maps evaluating timeliness of samples against timeliness targets.

- [`generate_timely_det_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_timely_det_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timely detection of AFP/ES samples

- [`generate_timely_ship_violin()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/generate_timely_ship_violin.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Timely shipment of AFP stool samples

- [`get_all_polio_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_all_polio_data.md)
  : Retrieve all pre-processed polio data

- [`get_azure_storage_connection()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_azure_storage_connection.md)
  : Validate connection to EDAV

- [`get_cdc_childvaxview_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_cdc_childvaxview_data.md)
  : Pull CDC NCIRD childvaxview immunization coverage data

- [`get_constant()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_constant.md)
  : Obtain a constant variable used in sirfunctions

- [`get_ctry_abbrev()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_ctry_abbrev.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Get country abbreviations

- [`get_diff_cols()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_diff_cols.md)
  : Get the columns where records differ in a group

- [`get_lab_date_col_missingness()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_lab_date_col_missingness.md)
  : Get missingness of date variables in the lab dataset

- [`get_lab_locs()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_lab_locs.md)
  : Table of information regarding testing labs in each country

- [`get_ppt_template()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_ppt_template.md)
  : Get path of the PowerPoint template

- [`get_region()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_region.md)
  : Determines whether lab data is EMRO or AFRO

- [`get_vpd_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_vpd_data.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Get vaccine preventable diseases dataset

- [`get_vpd_missingness()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_vpd_missingness.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Get years with missing data based on variable
  name and VPD

- [`get_vpd_vars()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/get_vpd_vars.md)
  : Obtain available variables for VPD data

- [`init_dr()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/init_dr.md)
  : Set up the folders and load polio data for the desk review

- [`init_kpi()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/init_kpi.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Initialize the KPI analysis pipeline

- [`iss_data_errors()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/iss_data_errors.md)
  : Checks for errors in the ISS data

- [`lab_data_errors()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/lab_data_errors.md)
  : Generate a log of potential errors in the lab data

- [`load_clean_ctry_sp()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/load_clean_ctry_sp.md)
  : Download country georgraphic data

- [`load_clean_dist_sp()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/load_clean_dist_sp.md)
  : Download district geographic data

- [`load_clean_prov_sp()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/load_clean_prov_sp.md)
  : Download province geographic data

- [`load_iss_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/load_iss_data.md)
  : Read ISS/eSURV data

- [`load_lab_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/load_lab_data.md)
  : Function to load the raw lab data locally

- [`send_outlook_email()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/send_outlook_email.md)
  : Send email through Outlook

- [`send_teams_message()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/send_teams_message.md)
  : Send a message on Microsoft Teams

- [`set_emergence_colors()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/set_emergence_colors.md)
  : Set the emergence colors

- [`sirfunctions_io()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/sirfunctions_io.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : sirfunctions i/o handler

- [`test_EDAV_connection()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/test_EDAV_connection.md)
  : Test network connection to the EDAV

- [`update_city_spatial_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/update_city_spatial_data.md)
  : Update City Spatial data

- [`update_polio_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/update_polio_data.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Update a local dataset with new data

- [`update_road_spatial_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/update_road_spatial_data.md)
  : Update Roads Spatial data

- [`update_vacc_cov_data()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/update_vacc_cov_data.md)
  : Extract vaccine coverage information from IHME estimates

- [`upload_to_sharepoint()`](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/reference/upload_to_sharepoint.md)
  : Upload file to Sharepoint

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Generating Global Polio
  Data](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/articles/generate-polio-data.md):
- [The KPI Analysis
  Pipeline](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/articles/kpi-analysis.md):
- [sirfunctions](https://cdcgov.github.io/sirfunctions/articles/sirfunctions.md):
